metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2446 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3 isaffected. Safari before 10.1 is affected. tvOS before 10.2 is affected. Theissue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code via a crafted web site that leverages themishandling of strict mode functions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2446` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.16.1-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.16.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.16.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.16.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.16.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.16.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in esm-infra/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.1-1').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
